item.title: New York Attorney General James sues Zelle parent company, alleging it enabled fraud
item.description: New York Attorney General Letitia James sued the parent company of payments network Zelle, alleging it enabled fraud.

item.title: Odds of Trump tapping David Zervos for Fed chief jump on Kalshi after CNBC report

item.title: Trump considering 11 candidates for Fed chair, including David Zervos and Rick Rieder, sources say
item.description: The size of the Fed Chair candidate list and the process described suggest a decision is not imminent and could take a considerable amount of time.
